testcase.title: 001)Check Chinese locale is displayed on Structure Search Page for localization

steps.title: I logged in as a "Localization" user with access to "CE-4" project

substeps.message: New Home page logged in  properly and Locale Icon is Displayed

steps.title: the "HomePage" page should be loaded on log on with Locale Dropdown
I verify "Chinese" language should listed under the Locale Dropdown and Select check-box against Chinese
I click on Structure Search Link

substeps.message: Structure Search page Loaded Properly With Chinese Text

On 'StructureSearch' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'homepage.header.label.structuresearch' with the key 'homepage.header.label.structuresearch' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ???? and the Content displayed on UI Structure search are NOT matching

On 'StructureSearch' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'homepage.structuresearch.type.exact' with the key 'homepage.structuresearch.type.exact' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ???? and the Content displayed on UI Exact match are NOT matching

On 'StructureSearch' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'homepage.structuresearch.type.relaxed' with the key 'homepage.structuresearch.type.relaxed' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ???? and the Content displayed on UI Flexible are NOT matching
